name: Mammography_HD_HCPCS
title: Mammography_HD_HCPCS
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for Breast Cancer Screening.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent of this value set is for the purpose of defining the clinical codes that constitute Breast Cancer Screening for inclusion and utilization in patients/users connected heath.),(Data Element Scope: Breast Cancer Screening care need for b.well.),(Inclusion Criteria: Breast Cancer Screening HCPCS Codes that constitute the Mammography for BCS care need for b.well.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)

concept.display: Screening mammography, bilateral (2-view study of each breast), including computer-aided detection (cad) when performed
Diagnostic mammography, including computer-aided detection (cad) when performed; bilateral
Diagnostic mammography, including computer-aided detection (cad) when performed; unilateral
Diagnostic digital breast tomosynthesis, unilateral or bilateral (list separately in addition to 77065 or 77066)

contains.display: Diagnostic digital breast tomosynthesis, unilateral or bilateral (list separately in addition to 77065 or 77066)
